code: import React from'react';import"./Corousel.scss";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{shortenText}from"../../utils";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CorouselItem=function CorouselItem(_ref){var url=_ref.url,name=_ref.name,price=_ref.price,description=_ref.description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carouselItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"product--image",src:url,alt:"product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"price",children:"$".concat(price)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:shortenText(name,18)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"--mb",children:shortenText(description,26)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary --btn-block",children:"Add To Cart"})]});};export default CorouselItem;
